languages.text: "Отлично, у Глейто сбой. Наша синхронизация нарушена, и он..." {n}Арбитр срывается на рев.{/n} "Да этот драный день когда-нибудь закончится?! Мой пес, единственный, кому я мог доверить свою жизнь — и он..." {n}Соломон яростно мотает головой в сторону.{/n}

"Great. An error. Our synchronisation is broken, and now he..." {n}His voice rises to a roar:{/n} "Will this damned day ever end? My dog, the only one I would trust with my life — he..." {n}Solomorne shakes his head furiously.{/n}

"Great. An error. Our synchronisation is broken, and now he..." {n}His voice rises to a roar:{/n} "Will this damned day ever end? My dog, the only one I would trust with my life — he..." {n}Solomorne shakes his head furiously.{/n}

languages.text: 「クソッ！エラーだ。同期が切れた。今のこいつは…」{n}彼の声は怒鳴り声に変わった。{/n}「この忌々しい一日はいつになったら終わるんだ！命を預けられる唯一の存在だった俺の犬が…！」{n}ソロモーンは激しく頭を振った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Great. An error. Our synchronisation is broken, and now he..." {n}His voice rises to a roar:{/n} "Will this damned day ever end? My dog, the only one I would trust with my life — he..." {n}Solomorne shakes his head furiously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「クソッ！エラーだ。同期が切れた。今のこいつは…」{n}彼の声は怒鳴り声に変わった。{/n}「この忌々しい一日はいつになったら終わるんだ！命を預けられる唯一の存在だった俺の犬が…！」{n}ソロモーンは激しく頭を振った。{/n}

languages.text: "Na toll. Ein Fehler. Unsere Synchronisierung ist aufgehoben und jetzt ..." {n}Seine Stimme erhebt sich zu einem Brüllen:{/n} "Hört dieser verdammte Tag denn niemals auf? Mein Hund, der Einzige, dem ich mein Leben anvertrauen würde, er ..." {n}Solomorne schüttelt erzürnt den Kopf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Great. An error. Our synchronisation is broken, and now he..." {n}His voice rises to a roar:{/n} "Will this damned day ever end? My dog, the only one I would trust with my life — he..." {n}Solomorne shakes his head furiously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Na toll. Ein Fehler. Unsere Synchronisierung ist aufgehoben und jetzt ..." {n}Seine Stimme erhebt sich zu einem Brüllen:{/n} "Hört dieser verdammte Tag denn niemals auf? Mein Hund, der Einzige, dem ich mein Leben anvertrauen würde, er ..." {n}Solomorne schüttelt erzürnt den Kopf.{/n}

languages.text: « Formidable. Une erreur. Nous sommes déjà désynchronisés, et maintenant, il... {n}La voix de Solormone se mue en rugissement.{/n} Quand est-ce que tout cela va cesser ? Mon chien, le seul être à qui je confierais aveuglément ma vie. Il... » {n}Solomorne secoue la tête, furieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Great. An error. Our synchronisation is broken, and now he..." {n}His voice rises to a roar:{/n} "Will this damned day ever end? My dog, the only one I would trust with my life — he..." {n}Solomorne shakes his head furiously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Formidable. Une erreur. Nous sommes déjà désynchronisés, et maintenant, il... {n}La voix de Solormone se mue en rugissement.{/n} Quand est-ce que tout cela va cesser ? Mon chien, le seul être à qui je confierais aveuglément ma vie. Il... » {n}Solomorne secoue la tête, furieux.{/n}

languages.text: «Estupendo. Un error. Nuestra sincronización se ha roto, y ahora no...». {n}Su voz se convierte en un grito:{/n} «¿Es que este maldito día no se va a terminar nunca? Mi perro, el único a quien confiaría mi vida, me ha...». {n}Solomorne sacude la cabeza, furioso.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Great. An error. Our synchronisation is broken, and now he..." {n}His voice rises to a roar:{/n} "Will this damned day ever end? My dog, the only one I would trust with my life — he..." {n}Solomorne shakes his head furiously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Estupendo. Un error. Nuestra sincronización se ha roto, y ahora no...». {n}Su voz se convierte en un grito:{/n} «¿Es que este maldito día no se va a terminar nunca? Mi perro, el único a quien confiaría mi vida, me ha...». {n}Solomorne sacude la cabeza, furioso.{/n}

languages.text: “这可真棒，出问题了。我们之间的联结也被打破了，它现在……”{n}他的声音变成了咆哮。{/n}“这该死的日子，到底什么时候是个头？我的狗，我唯一用生命信任的伙伴，它……”{n}索罗蒙狂怒地摇着头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Great. An error. Our synchronisation is broken, and now he..." {n}His voice rises to a roar:{/n} "Will this damned day ever end? My dog, the only one I would trust with my life — he..." {n}Solomorne shakes his head furiously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这可真棒，出问题了。我们之间的联结也被打破了，它现在……”{n}他的声音变成了咆哮。{/n}“这该死的日子，到底什么时候是个头？我的狗，我唯一用生命信任的伙伴，它……”{n}索罗蒙狂怒地摇着头。{/n}

languages.text: "Harika. Bir hata. Önce senkronizasyonumuz bozuldu, şimdi de..." {n}Sesini yükselterek kükrüyor.{/n} "Bu lanet gün bitebilir mi artık? Köpeğim, hayatımı emanet edebileceğim tek kişi... O..." {n}Solomorne öfkeyle başını sallıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Great. An error. Our synchronisation is broken, and now he..." {n}His voice rises to a roar:{/n} "Will this damned day ever end? My dog, the only one I would trust with my life — he..." {n}Solomorne shakes his head furiously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Harika. Bir hata. Önce senkronizasyonumuz bozuldu, şimdi de..." {n}Sesini yükselterek kükrer:{/n} "Bu lanet gün bitecek mi artık? Köpeğim, hayatımı emanet edebileceğim tek kişi... O..." {n}Solomorne öfkeyle başını sallar.{/n}
